mapper.select:
SELECT id, profile_id AS profileid, prop_key AS propkey, prop_value AS propvalue, prop_desc AS propdesc, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater FROM service_config_profile_prop WHERE isvalid = 1 AND profile_id = #{profileId}
AND prop_key LIKE concat('%', #{propKey}, '%')
AND prop_value LIKE concat('%', #{propValue}, '%')
ORDER BY prop_key
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_config_profile_prop(profile_id, prop_key, prop_value, prop_desc, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES(#{profileId}, #{propKey}, #{propValue}, #{propDesc}, #{remark}, 1, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{updater})
mapper.update: UPDATE service_config_profile_prop SET mtime = now(), prop_key = #{propKey}, prop_value = #{propValue}, prop_desc = #{propDesc}, updater = #{updater} WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE service_config_profile_prop SET mtime = now(), updater = #{updater}, isvalid = 0 WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
